channel.title: CVE Feed for Tips and Tricks HQ -- Simple Download Monitor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tips and Tricks HQ -- Simple Download Monitor

item.title: CVE-2020-5651|2024-08-04T08:39:25.748Z -- tips%20and%20tricks%20hq -- simple%20download%20monitor
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Simple Download Monitor 3.8.8 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-5650|2024-08-04T08:39:25.910Z -- tips%20and%20tricks%20hq -- simple%20download%20monitor
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Simple Download Monitor 3.8.8 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
